channel.title: Aman Kalra - Aspiring Product Manager
channel.description: Aman Kalra is an aspiring and passionate prdoduct manager currently working on open source product called Loophole.

item.title: Should Big Decisions Be Based on Data or Your Intuition?
item.description: Data is black and white and incredibly useful but it does not paint the entire picture. This is where intuition comes into play.
item.content:encoded:
Data is black and white and incredibly useful but it does not paint the entire picture. This is where intuition comes into play.

Keep reading.

item.title: Get Started with Loophole!
item.description: Aspire to expose your localhost to the Internet with minimal effort? Do you wish to avoid going through the tedious deployment process? Let me introduce you to Loophole.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: My 3 strategies for leading through these uncertain times!
item.description: Pandemic provides enough reminders that leaders cannot control the degree of change. Let's take control.
item.content:encoded:
